name: Syberia 2

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/game/Syberia2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/game
gogid: syberia
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: winemenubuilder.exe
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: ''
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES '/DIR=C:/game'
    description: Installing...
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: sandbox
    description: Disabling unused WINE features
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- execute:
    args: -c "printf '0 BaseCMO.cmo'>$GAMEDIR/drive_c/game/player.ini"
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
